name: PRASHREY
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Versatile software developer with 9 years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications. Initially focused on frontend development, now actively transitioning into full stack development with practical skills in React, Next.js, Redux, and growing backend expertise in Node.js and Express.js. Strong advocate for accessibility and Core Web Vitals optimization. Proven track record in leading modules, mentoring developers, and delivering high-quality code in agile environments.

responsibilities: Led design, development, and maintenance of application modules in an Agile environment
Coded and debugged complex features with focus on performance
Optimized accessibility and Core Web Vitals
Reviewed code, mentored juniors, and documented specs
Built C# microservices and MVC-based bot automation tools
Managed SQL databases, wrote new features for enterprise tools
Designed cross-platform apps with strong UX
